content: this marker shows the beginning of the round center of front and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts round 1 slmm k2 p2 to mm repeat last round 24 24 24 24 24 24 more times ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 2 body note each of the front and back pattern becomes symmetrical in the center set-up-row slmm k15 15 15 16 16 16 pm1 k3 pm2 k15 15 15 16 16 16 m1r k15 15 15 16 16 16 pm3 k3 pm4 k13 13 13 14 14 14 m1r 2 sts increase d 66 66 66 70 70 70 sts front mm m1 m4 m2 m3 back short row 1 sizes xs s m only slmm k2 p1 k3 p1 to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k1 p1 k3 p1 to 1 st before m3 k1 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l turn with yarn in front sl 1 st purlwise and create ds = make ds slm4 p3 slm3 p to m2 slm2 p3 slm1 p1 turn make ds slm1 k3 slm2 work body patt to m3 slm3 k3 slm4 work ds p1 k3 to mm slmm k to 1 st before m1 work ds m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l k to mm 8 sts increase d 74 74 74 - - - sts short row 1 sizes l xl xxl only slmm k2 p1 k3 p1 to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k2 p1 k3 p1 to 2 st before m3 k2 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l turn with yarn in front sl 1 st purlwise and create ds = make ds slm4 p3 slm3 p to m2 slm2 p3 slm1 p1 turn make ds slm1 k3 slm2 work body patt to m3 slm3 k3 slm4 work ds k1 p1 k3 to mm slmm k to 1 st before m1 work ds m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l k to mm 8 sts increase d - - - 78 78 78 sts short row 2 all sizes resolve dss as they appear slmm work body patt to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k1 or p1 turn make ds p1 or k1 slm2 p3 slm1 p1 turn make ds m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l work body patt to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l k1 or p1 turn make ds p1 or k1 slm4 p3 slm3 p1 turn ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 3 make ds m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l work body patt to mm slmm k to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l k to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l k to mm 12 sts increase d 86 86 86 90 90 90 sts next repeat short row 2 5 more times next short row 3 all sizes resolve dss as they appear slmm work body patt to m1 m1r slm1 k3 slm2 m1l work body patt to m3 m1r slm3 k3 slm4 m1l
